asans raihtis managa, iþ waurstwjans fawai.
MATT 9.38 bidjiþ nu fraujan asanais ei ussandjai waurstwjans in asan seina.
MATT 10.1 Jah athaitands þans twalif siponjans...
...MATT 10.23 þizai baurg, þliuhaiþ in anþara:
amen auk qiþa izwis, ei ni ustiuhiþ baurgs Israelis, unte qimiþ sa sunus mans.
MATT 10.24 nist siponeis ufar laisarja nih skalks ufar fraujin seinamma.
MATT 10.25 Ganah siponi ei wairþai swe laisareis is jah skalks swe frauja is;
jabai gardawaldand Baiailzaibul haihaitun, und ƕan filu mais þans innakundans is.
MATT 10.26 ni nunu ogeiþ izwis ins;
ni waiht auk ist gahuliþ, þatei ni andhuljaidau, jah fulgin, þatei ni ufkunnaidau.
MATT 10.27 þatei qiþa izwis in riqiza, qiþaiþ in liuhada, jah þatei in auso gahauseiþ, merjaiþ ana hrotam.
MATT 10.28 jah ni ogeiþ izwis þans usqimandans leika þatainei, iþ saiwalai ni magandans usqiman, iþ ogeiþ mais þana magandan jah saiwalai jah leika fraqistjan in gaiainnan.
MATT 10.29 niu twai sparwans assarjau bugjanda?
jah ains ize ni gadriusiþ ana airþa inuh attins izwaris wiljan.
MATT 10.30 aþþan izwara jah tagla haubidis alla garaþana sind.
MATT 10.32 Saƕazuh nu saei andhaitiþ mis in andwairþja manne, andhaita jah ik imma in andwairþja attins meinis saei in himinam ist.
MATT 10.33 iþ þisƕanoh saei afaikiþ mik in andwairþja manne, afaika jah ik ina in andwairþja attins meinis þis saei in himinam ist.
MATT 10.34 nih ahjaiþ þatei qemjau lagjan gawairþi ana airþa;
ni qam lagjan gawairþi, ak hairu.
MATT 10.35 qam auk skaidan mannan wiþra attan is jah dauhtar wiþra aiþein izos jah bruþ wiþra swaihron izos;
MATT 10.36 jah fijands mans innakundai is.

MATT 10.37 saei frijoþ attan aiþþau aiþein ufar mik, nist meina wairþs; jah saei frijoþ sunu aiþþau dauhtar ufar mik, nist meina wairþs. MATT 10.38 jah saei ni nimiþ galgan seinana jah laistjai afar mis, nist meina wairþs.
MATT 10.39 saei bigitiþ saiwala seina, fraqisteiþ izai;
jah saei fraqisteiþ saiwalai seinai in meina, bigitiþ þo.
MATT 10.40 sa andnimands izwis mik andnimiþ, jah sa mik andnimands andnimiþ þana sandjandan mik.
MATT 10.41 sa andnimands praufetu in namin praufetaus mizdon praufetaus nimiþ, jah sa andnimands garaihtana in namin garaihtis mizdon garaihtis nimiþ.
MATT 10.42 jah saei gadragkeiþ ainana þize minnistane stikla kaldis watins þatainei in namin siponeis, amen qiþa izwis, ei ni fraqisteiþ mizdon seinai.
MATT 11.1 Jah warþ, biþe usfullida Iesus anabiudands þaim twalif siponjam seinaim,
ushof sik jainþro du laisjan jah merjan and baurgs ize.
MATT 11.2 iþ Iohannes gahausjands in karkarai waurstwa Xristaus, insandjands bi siponjam seinaim qaþ du imma:
MATT 11.3 þu u is sa qimanda þau anþarizuh beidaima?
MATT 11.4 jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ du im:
gaggandans gateihiþ Iohanne þatei gahauseiþ jah gasaiƕiþ.
MATT 11.5 blindai ussaiƕand, jah haltai gaggand, þrutsfillai hrainjai wairþand, jah baudai gahausjand, jah dauþai urreisand, jah unledai wailamerjanda:
MATT 11.6 jah audags ist ƕazuh saei ni gamarzjada in mis.
MATT 11.7 at þaim þan afgaggandam, dugann Iesus qiþan þaim manageim bi Iohannen:
sai, þaiei hnasqjaim wasidai sind, in gardim þiudane sind.
MATT 11.10 sa ist auk bi þanei gameliþ ist:
sai, ik insandja aggilu meinana faura þus, saei gamanweiþ wig þeinana faura þus.
